content.question: In the painted elk hide attributed to Cotsiogo (Cadzi Cody), freehand painting and stenciling were likely used to create

choices.label: an energized surface with repeated colors and motifs
a Great Plains landscape with monochromatic tones
a composition divided into small squares that each contain different symbols
curvilinear plant motifs that contrast with geometric patterns

content.answer: an energized surface with repeated colors and motifs

topic.text: 5.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
